alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sweetwater County through 345 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Creston Junction, which is also 15 miles east of Wamsutter, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Sweetwater County. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 175 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
